channel.title: Archlinux on Isulew's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Archlinux on Isulew's Blog

item.title: archlinux上架设goagent
item.description: 安装准备 需要安装的包 pacman -S wget pacman -S python2-crypto python2-pyopenssl python2-gevent python2-greenlet nss 获取安装包 cd ~ wget https://nodeload.github.com/goagent/goagent/legacy.zip/3.0 mv goagent* goagent goagent配置 cd ~/goagent/local cat > proxy.user.ini << EOF [listen] ip = 0.0.0.0 username = *proxy* password = *goagent* visible = 0 [gae] appid = <goagent> password = <password> window =
